frames.title: D1. Additional Material Needed – Tech Mobile SRO
frames.decision_question: Is additional  Material needed for this appointment?
frames.narr2: Keeping with the companies policy of Respond to the customer as soon as possible and do it right the fact is while the service is carefully planned and all planned material in available for the visit unexpected parts may be need to finish the job well. Hence the decision on whether additional material is needed has to be taken

frames.title: Y1. Yes Additional Material is needed– Tech Mobile SRO
frames.narr1: Y1. Yes Additional Material is needed– Tech Mobile SRO
frames.narr2: Based on the expertise of the Tech and the situation at hand the customer oriented tech decides that additional material is needed hence Yes

frames.title: D2. Is Additional Work – Tech Mobile SRO
frames.decision_question: Is additional work needed on the unit outside the scope of this appointment
frames.narr2: While performing the work schedule for this visit the Expert Palco tech notices a need to do additional work to keep the generator performing to the high standards of Kohler and Palco Hence a decision of Is additional work needed is checked

frames.title: Y2. Yes  Additional Work is needed – Tech Mobile SRO
frames.narr1: Y2. Yes  Additional Work is needed
frames.narr2: Yes The Tech in conjunction with the service writer or service Manager informs the customer that additional work is needed

frames.title: D3. Additional Work Completed during this visit – Tech Mobile SRO
frames.decision_question: Can this additional work be performed during this visit?
frames.narr1: D3. Additional Work Completed during this visit
frames.narr2: Having decided that additional work is need the service team and tech have to make a determination that this extra work can be accommodated in this visit needs to be asked ?

frames.title: Y3. Additional Work can be completed  – Tech Mobile SRO
frames.narr1: Y3. Additional Work can be completed
frames.narr2: The very capable and customer focused Service department along with Palco tech's who go the extra mile for the customer decide that this additional work can be performed during this visit

frames.title: N3. No Additional work not completed this visit – Tech Mobile SRO
frames.narr1: N3. No Additional work not completed this visit
